nodes.text: A Dark Jedi was a male Chiss who was sensitive to the Force, and eventually fell to the dark side. At some point during the Galactic Civil War between the Galactic Empire and the Alliance to Restore the Republic, the Chiss was confronted by at least two enemies. During the skirmish, the Dark Jedi used the Force to unleash a destructive wave of energy against his foes. The man had blue skin, red eyes, and black hair. He wore black and brown Jedi robes and owned a lightsaber.
The Chiss Dark Jedi appeared on the card "Force Shockwave" from the Squadrons Over Corellia expansion set of the Star Wars Galaxies Trading Card Game. He was drawn by Lan Jun Kang.
